ExtendedSection.Title: Configuring head includes for a formatter

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
The CSS styles and JavaScript that a formatter employs should be added to the formatter configuration. Formatter configurations are XML files (of type formatter-config) that are editable via the form-based editor. Multiple CSS or JavaScript includes can be added - either inline or as links to files.

Section.Caption: Deprecated way to configure head includes

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The formatter configuration was introduced in OpenCms 9.0. Before, head includes were configured in the XSD that defined the content type. We strongly recommend avoiding this old method of adding head includes.
